text: @ericbolling @Cate66 @realDonaldTrump Possibly. It's known St Thomas' Hospital is involved with major trials of experimental drugs on Covid-19 patients. The hospital has been using medications like the antimalarial drug hydroxychloroquine, which have been approved by drug regulators for clinical trial purposes only.
